name: Test the most expensive product title and price for 'Ноутбуки' category and 'HP' brand
description: After searching for the most expensive product in 'Ноутбуки' category, with 'HP' brand and adding it to the shopping cart, the name of the product and its price must match the name and price indicated on the product card

steps.name: Send 'Ноутбуки' keyword into the search input
Send 'HP' keyword into the brand search input
Select HP brand from the list of brands in the filter panel
Sort product list from expensive to cheap
Click the first product from the sorted list
Get the product name from the product card
Click the 'buy' button on the product card
Get the product name from the cart
Get the total order value from the cart
Verify product title: Ноутбук HP ZBook Create G7 (2H6U6AV_V3) Turbo Silver should be equal to Ноутбук HP ZBook Create G7 (2H6U6AV_V3) Turbo Silver

parameters.name: productTitleFromShoppingCart
parameters.value: Ноутбук HP ZBook Create G7 (2H6U6AV_V3) Turbo Silver

parameters.name: productTitleFromProductCard
parameters.value: Ноутбук HP ZBook Create G7 (2H6U6AV_V3) Turbo Silver

steps.name: Verify product price: 121755 should be less than 500000

labels.name: story
labels.value: Search for the most expensive item in a given category, with a given brand and add it to the cart
